summary: Documented sent folder config fix, implemented sync_all() function, added sidebar keybindings (s/S/A/i) for sync and account operations, and updated help menu with Sync & Accounts and Threading sections.

artifacts.summary: Documentation for himalaya sent folder configuration fix
Added sync_all() function for full folder synchronization
Added s/S/A/i keybindings for sync and account operations
Added Sync & Accounts and Threading sections to help menu
Implementation summary for himalaya sidebar keybindings and help menu

completion_data.completion_summary: Documented himalaya sent folder config fix, implemented sync_all() function for HimalayaSyncFull command, added 4 sidebar keybindings (s/S/A/i) for sync and account operations, and updated help menu with new Sync & Accounts and Threading sections.

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim and pressing '?' in the himalaya sidebar to verify help menu, then test s/S/A/i keybindings
